member.name: T:KenticoCloud.Delivery.DeliveryClient
member.summary: Executes requests against the Kentico Cloud Delivery API.

member.name: P:KenticoCloud.Delivery.DeliveryClient.ContentLinkUrlResolver
member.summary: Gets or sets an object that resolves links to content items in Rich text element values.

member.name: P:KenticoCloud.Delivery.DeliveryClient.CodeFirstModelProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets an object that performs conversion of content items to code-first models.

member.name: M:KenticoCloud.Delivery.DeliveryClient.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for the published content of the specified project.
member.param: The identifier of the Kentico Cloud project.

member.name: M:KenticoCloud.Delivery.DeliveryClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for the unpublished content of the specified project.
member.param: The identifier of the Kentico Cloud project.
The Preview API key.

member.name: M:KenticoCloud.Delivery.DeliveryClient.GetItemJsonAsync(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Returns a content item as JSON data.
member.param: The codename of a content item.
An array that contains zero or more query parameters, for example for projection or depth of modular content.
member.returns: The instance that represents the content item with the specified codename.

member.name: M:KenticoCloud.Delivery.DeliveryClient.GetItemsJsonAsync(System.String[])
member.summary: Returns content items as JSON data.
member.param: An array that contains zero or more query parameters, for example for filtering, ordering or depth of modular content.
member.returns: The instance that represents the content items. If no query parameters are specified, all content items are returned.

member.summary: Returns a content item.
member.param: The codename of a content item.
An array that contains zero or more query parameters, for example for projection or depth of modular content.
member.returns: The instance that contains the content item with the specified codename.

member.summary: Gets one strongly typed content item by its codename.
member.typeparam: Type of the code-first model. (Or if the return type is not yet known.)
member.param: The codename of a content item.
An array that contains zero or more query parameters, for example for projection or depth of modular content.
member.returns: The instance that contains the content item with the specified codename.

member.summary: Gets a list of content items.

member.summary: Casts the item to a code-first model.

member.name: M:KenticoCloud.Delivery.ContentItem.GetString(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a string value from an element and resolves content links in Rich text element values. To resolve content links the property must be set.
member.param: The codename of the element.
member.returns: The value of the element with the specified codename, if available; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:KenticoCloud.Delivery.ContentItem.GetNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of the specified Number element.
member.param: The codename of the element.
member.returns: The value of the element with the specified codename, if available; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:KenticoCloud.Delivery.ContentItem.GetModularContent(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a collection of content items that are assigned to the specified Modular content element.
member.param: The codename of the element.
member.returns: A collection of content items that are assigned to the element with the specified codename.
member.remarks: The collection contains only content items that are included in the response from the Delivery API as modular content. For more information see the Modular content topic in the Delivery API documentation.

member.name: M:KenticoCloud.Delivery.ContentItem.GetAssets(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a collection of assets that were uploaded to the specified Asset element.
member.param: The codename of the element.
member.returns: A collection of assets that were uploaded to the element with the specified codename.

member.name: M:KenticoCloud.Delivery.ContentItem.GetOptions(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a collection of options that were selected in the specified Multiple choice element.
member.param: The codename of the element.
member.returns: A list of selected options of the element with the specified codename.

member.summary: Returns a collection of taxonomy terms that are assigned to the specified Taxonomy element.

member.returns: A collection of taxonomy terms that are assigned to the element with the specified codename.

member.name: T:KenticoCloud.Delivery.AllFilter
member.summary: Represents a filter that matches a content item if the specified content element or system attribute has a value that contains all the specified values. This filter is applicable to array values only, such as sitemap location or value of Modular content, Taxonomy and Multiple choice content elements.

member.name: M:KenticoCloud.Delivery.AllFilter.#ctor(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The codename of a content element or system attribute, for example elements.title or system.name.
The filter values.

member.name: T:KenticoCloud.Delivery.AnyFilter
member.summary: Represents a filter that matches a content item if the specified content element or system attribute has a value that contains any of the specified values. This filter is applicable to array values only, such as sitemap location or value of Modular content, Taxonomy and Multiple choice content elements.

member.name: M:KenticoCloud.Delivery.AnyFilter.#ctor(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The codename of a content element or system attribute, for example elements.title or system.name.
The filter values.

member.name: T:KenticoCloud.Delivery.ContainsFilter
member.summary: Represents a filter that matches a content item if the specified content element or system attribute has a value that contains the specified value. This filter is applicable to array values only, such as sitemap location or value of Modular content, Taxonomy and Multiple choice content elements.

member.name: M:KenticoCloud.Delivery.ContainsFilter.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The codename of a content element or system attribute, for example elements.title or system.name.
The filter value.

member.summary: Represents a filter that matches a content item if the specified content element or system attribute has the specified value.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The codename of a content element or system attribute, for example elements.title or system.name.
The filter value.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
